title: You're falling behind on your Rek'sai nerf quota for this season
body: It's getting real bad. I even managed to win a game with her today.

replies.body: Eh, quota changed. Malzahar now.

And buffing lucian. Quota is to nerf a champ and buff lucian. Like i swear, lucian does soo much damage for a mobile champion you'd think an immobile one would at least beat him in damage. Nah. Chase down and out trade all at low mana cost.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Ah, the poor girl. I can't stand playing her anymore, easily the most boring champion in the game.

I simply hope her incoming rework will push her towards what she was at relase: a damage threat, actively invading with her tremor sense, mauling people. 

And not a walking ward flash knockup bot.
Isn't her Tremor Sense one of the reasons she's kept so weak?

More like Tremor Sense effectiveness **in pro play**, not even by itself, but in combination with the team fight potential of a flash W. 

Even before the last set of nerfs hit her, she was already absolutely unplayable​ in soloq. Still, she was a staple pick in competitive, and riot didn't like it.
Because it's broken in pro play. In SoloQ it's only really useful for Rek'Sai herself unless you're on voice comms.

I really miss my baby Rek' Sai.

#bringbacktunnelsssssssss

I think they stated they want her to be Vanguard so I doubt you'll be happy with the rework - I sense she will remain engage-bot. But hey this was millenia ago so it looks like they even forgot she exists in the first place in the meantime, kek.

They are going to shift her back to be a Diver.
She is played as a Vanguard **right now**, but they want to change that.

For example they stated that they want to buff her solo kill potential alot.
My bad then. I then hope they will be successful with it.
so she's going to be a ranged melee carry?  XD

The balance team is like 
"Nerf? What's a rek'sai?"
"I think he said nerf Maokai"
Better break Irelia's kneecaps just to be safe.
Are you kidding me, mate?! Irelia doesn't need kneecaps to win!! {{champion:39}}{{champion:39}}{{champion:39}}

{{champion:164}}  : what are kneecaps?

XD
{{champion:39}} {{item:3070}}
What is a "Rek'Sai?" Is it a plant? Or some kind of tool?
Rek'sai is activity done for enjoyment when not working, if I remember correctly.

No, good sir, you're thinking of _recreation_.

Rek'sai is advice you give someone, oftentimes about a place to eat or a movie to watch.

edit: This has always been my favorite game on the boards :3

Apologizes sir, put you are thinking of a _recommendation._

Rek'sai is an action performed in response to a situation, or what can happen when two elements come into contact.

Huh? I think you're mistaken, that's a _reaction._

Rek'sai is when you do dangerous things without thinking about the repercussions.

I am sorry, but you are actually talking about _recklessness_.

Rek'Sai is the act of becoming healthy after an illness or injury.

I believe you have mistaken it for recommendation, my good man.

Rek'Sai means to gather tactical information about the location of an enemy.
Oh so now that we can't use Galio for this anymore Rek is the substitute.
Feeding?

welcome to e-sport graveyard
{{champion:429}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:203}}  and more already lay here
{{champion:18}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:38}}
TBH Tristana does too many different things at once. They need to refine what they actually want her to be.

> [{quoted}](name=SynthetikzDoPe,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yOkv28Vp,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2017-05-09T21:38:41.286+0000)
>
> welcome to e-sport graveyard
> {{champion:429}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:203}}  and more already lay here

Don't forget ryze

Supposedly there's a rework (ala Shyvana or Amumu) that's tweaking her to be more diver-y than AFK knock-up bot.

So I guess there's your big nerf?
Don't they want her to be Vanguard now? I think they stated something like that.
Riot has stated they're turning Rek'Sai into the diver she was intended to be. Right now, she's a vanguard.

I used to main Rek'sai back in season 5 and even then I heard she is no more than a tank because they gutted her Q dmg so much, I didn't play her since they changed the passive refresh ratio, she is just useless

I don't really care at all about Rek because Riot said something pretty meaningful for once:

Rek'sai is one of the only champions in this game who has an unreplaceable role in a well coordinated team. Her ability to indirectly see everything in a large radius turned out to be a way too dominant tool in the LCS and rather than try to gut that feature and turn her into a generic fighter, they decided it's for the best to let the vision stay but the strength go. There is no possible way you can balance Rek'sai for both ranked players and LCS players, she's just a way too coordinated character to have reasonable strength AND her vision radius.

Buff Rek'sai's strength -> LCS perma pick/ban
Nerf Rek'sai's strength -> Unplayable outside of LCS

This is why I stopped caring for this shitshow called "LCS" years ago.

It's repetitive and negatively affects my own games that have nothing to do with it.

if only there were some vision

better to light it up like a christmas tree than to nerf/buff everything in existence for a minor change
But they still nerfed the tremor passive anyway - as to how significant the nerf was I don't know, but they did.

The Tremor sense nerf made her feel worse, and made it harder to track targets, but it still gives the little pings for people walking. It retains its use in pros, because you know there's a person there, which your team can coordinate around.
Rek`Sai tries to get under you with her tunnels you walk the other direction getting you into a safe distance from her. Oh wait she flashed W me guess I should have outplayed that like Lee`s kick

Yes, it's called not being in that position. You can easily flash her flash as well.

Not surprised you think Lee has no counter play either considering you're low elo

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7SgZM-56hDA
You Na folks need to tell Trump to put some money into your education system
I'm not surprised you're still hardstuck gold 5 while maining the most braindead adc
Thats what her rework will be for
Nerfing malzahar is the new deal, Rek sai is already soo last season c,

For people who know nothing about {{champion:421}} rework:
 - Changing W to single target knock up
 - Remake ultimate into an almost completely new ability
 - "Current changes in testing don't change Prey Seeker (Burrowed Q) itself substantially but do offer a bit more combo with another part of her kit that makes it feel situationally quite a bit better." (Quote from Meddler)
 - Add incentive to build bruiser instead of tank
 - I'm assuming they're going to nerf/rework tremor sense as it's been the cause of lots of her problems

Most of this is rather old info from 3ish months ago, but it's all we have to go off of.
Rek was never planned to be part of the tank update, her original rework was supposed to come out multiple patches ago, but kept being delayed due to not having artists to work on her. Now that it's after mid season, the artists are available and the rework should be coming out in a patch or 2.

She's got a small scale rework incoming so they are just ignoring her now.  She was supposed to be a part of the tank update, but they couldn't fit her in in time.  I suspect in the next 2 weeks we'll be seeing her on the PBE, as we have Rammus this PBE cycle getting a "small" scale rework.
why would she be part of the tank update, she's supposed to be a diver not a tank

She wasn't going to in it because she was a tank. She was soposed to be in it but they couldn't get the art done in time so they left her out as far as I know. But as of right now she is in a really bad spot. The only reason people can win games as her right now is by playing knock up bot and being a pain in the ass for the enemy adc and midlane because unless she gets on top of them for 4 seconds or is so incredibly fed that w q titanic e somehow manages to kill them. I've. Never played release Rek'sai btw so I have no idea how broken she was but ever since I've played her she has been a tank that the profile says diver. Rip me imao

Who would have thought taking away 90% of the damage from a fighter would have resulted in this???


Basically everyone. Probably the worst handled newer champion. The modern version of Malzahar and Ryze.
they no let me play now that sucks
